topic.title: Obtain the Current Selected Element Using the Author API

section.title: Question
section.p: If in the Author mode, an element is fully selected, I would like to perform an action on it. If not, I would like to perform an action on the node which is located at the caret position. Is this possible via the API?

section.title: Answer
section.p: When an element is fully selected by the user the selection start and end offsets are actually outside of the node's offset bounds. So using AuthorDocumentController.getNodeAtOffset will actually return the parent of the selected node. We have some special API which makes it easier for you to determine this situation: WSAuthorEditorPageBase.getFullySelectedNode().
